verses.verse: <S%H7592>Ask<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H4456>spring<s%> <S%H4456>rain<s%> â€“ The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H6213>makes<s%> the <S%H2385>storm<s%> <S%H2385>clouds;<s%> And He will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H1653>showers<s%> of <S%H1653>rain,<s%> <S%H6212>vegetation<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> to [each] <S%H376>man.<s%>

For the <S%H8655>teraphim<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> And the <S%H7080>diviners<s%> <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8267>visions,<s%> And <S%H1696>tell<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H2472>dreams;<s%> They <S%H5162>comfort<s%> in <S%H7723>vain.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> [the people] <S%H5265>wander<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> They are <S%H6031>afflicted,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%>

"My <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H2734>kindled<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> And I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H6260>male<s%> <S%H6260>goats;<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H6485>visited<s%> His <S%H5739>flock,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> And will <S%H7760>make<s%> them like His <S%H1935>majestic<s%> <S%H5483>horse<s%> in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

"From them will <S%H3318>come<s%> the <S%H6438>cornerstone,<s%> From them the <S%H3489>tent<s%> <S%H3489>peg,<s%> From them the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H4421>battle,<s%> From them <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5065>ruler,<s%> [all] of them <S%H9191>together.<s%>

"And they will be as <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men,<s%> <S%H947>Treading<s%> <S%H947>down<s%> [the enemy] in the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%> in <S%H4421>battle;<s%> And they will <S%H3898>fight,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> [will be] with them; And the <S%H7392>riders<s%> on <S%H5483>horses<s%> will be <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H1396>strengthen<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> And I shall <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> And I shall <S%H7725>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>back,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>had<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on them; And they will be as <S%H9201>though<s%> I had not <S%H2186>rejected<s%> them, For I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and I will <S%H6030>answer<s%> them.

"And <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> will be like a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>man,<s%> And their <S%H3820>heart<s%> will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> as <S%H3644>if<s%> [from] <S%H3196>wine;<s%> Indeed, their <S%H1121>children<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> [it] and be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"I will <S%H8319>whistle<s%> for them to <S%H6908>gather<s%> them together, For I have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> them; And they will be as <S%H7235>numerous<s%> as they were before.

"When I <S%H2232>scatter<s%> them among the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> They will <S%H2142>remember<s%> Me in <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H4801>countries,<s%> And they with their <S%H1121>children<s%> will <S%H2421>live<s%> and <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>back.<s%>

"I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> And <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from <S%H804>Assyria;<s%> And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> Until <S%H3808>no<s%> [room] can be <S%H4672>found<s%> for them.

"And He will <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H3220>sea<s%> [of] <S%H6869>distress,<s%> And <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H1530>waves<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> So that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4688>depths<s%> of the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> will <S%H3001>dry<s%> up; And the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> will be <S%H3381>brought<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> And the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will <S%H5493>depart.<s%>
"And I shall <S%H1396>strengthen<s%> them in the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And in His <S%H8034>name<s%> they will <S%H1980>walk,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
